channel.title: EOH Conversations

description.p: Conversations with the EOH Group CEO Stephen Van Coller

channel.itunes:subtitle: To provide the technology, knowledge, skills, and organisational ability critical to the development and growth of the markets we serve. To be an ethical, relevant force for good and to play a positive role in our society, beyond normal business practice.
channel.itunes:author: EOH | Solid Gold Studios
channel.itunes:summary:
Conversations with the EOH Group CEO Stephen Van Coller
Recorded and produced at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.title: 02v | Two Day Sprint Preview | Stephen Van Coller | Group CEO, Colin Iles, Neil Jacobsohn
item.itunes:title: 02v | Two Day Sprint Preview | Stephen Van Coller | Group CEO, Colin Iles, Neil Jacobsohn
item.itunes:subtitle: Preparing for the Two Day Sprint sessions
item.description:
Stephen van Coller | Group CEO, Colin Iles | Innovation Catalysts | Founder and Neil Jacobsohn | FutureWorld International | Senior Partner discuss what you can expect from the up-coming Two Day Sprint sessions.


Learn more about the top IT Service Provider in South Africa www.eoh.co.za


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
